function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases spread through outdoor activities and social interactions in urban parks during the pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential for outbreak clusters in densely populated park areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, promoting mask usage, and discouraging large gatherings in parks.","Technologies":"Public health signage, contactless technology for park amenities, and online park reservations to limit capacity.","People":"Park visitors, nearby residents, and park maintenance staff.","Owner":"Local government authorities and park management organizations."},{"Description":"Higher education and knowledge in urban planning may lead to overconfidence in understanding disease transmission dynamics in U  urban public parks.","Impact":"Misjudgment of disease risk and inadequate precautionary measures in urban park planning and management.","Mitigation":"Consulting with public health experts and epidemiologists when making decisions about urban park development and policy.","Technologies":"Modeling and simulation software for disease spread in urban environments, and data analytics for monitoring park usage patterns.","People":"Urban planners, park designers, and city officials responsible for urban development.","Owner":"Public health agencies and urban planning departments."},{"Description":"Increased demand for urban green spaces may lead to overcrowding and insufficient social distancing measures in parks.","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission due to crowded park environments and lack of adherence to public health guidelines.","Mitigation":"Expanding park capacity, creating additional green spaces, and enforcing social distancing regulations through park rangers or security personnel.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis for identifying optimal park locations, smart park monitoring systems to track visitor density, and mobile apps for real-time park occupancy updates.","People":"Park visitors, local residents, and city officials responsible for park management.","Owner":"Local government authorities and park management organizations."}]}
